item.title: CVE-2024-32587|2024-04-18T08:48:56.266Z -- envialosimple -- env%C3%ADalosimple
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EnvialoSimple EnvíaloSimple allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects EnvíaloSimple: from n/a through 2.2.
